thread.title: Dubai Municipality and Dubai Tourism Authority support IAEM’s Emergency Management Summit
thread.title_full: Dubai Municipality and Dubai Tourism Authority support IAEM’s Emergency Management Summit

title: Dubai Municipality and Dubai Tourism Authority support IAEM’s Emergency Management Summit
text: Distribution channels: Business & Economy , Energy ... Dubai Municipality and Dubai Tourism Authority support IAEM’s Emergency Management Summit IAEM hosted Emergency Management & Business Contingency Summit 2015 to taking place from 7-8 October 2015 to learn about best practices emergency management. The summit provides a platform for professionals on how to improve security resilience, determine best practices for planning and executing a comprehensive crisis management plan for an organisation. — H.E. Khaled Al Mansouri, President, IAEM DUBAI, UNITED ARAB EMIRATES, September 27,   IAEM and IQPC are teaming up to produce the Emergency Management & Business Contingency Summit 2015 supported by the Dubai Municipality and Dubai Tourism Authority, taking place from 7-8 October at Grand Habtoor Hotel, Dubai. This event will gather industry experts with first-hand experience in dealing with disasters - from small-scale fires to large-scale terrorist attacks – to share best practice with their peers. www.emergencymanagementme.com/news This event is designed for emergency managers and related professionals seeking to learn about best practices emergency management, security enhancements, centralised command center coordination, business contingency resilience and much more. IAEM’s President, International Council, His Excellency Khaled Al Mansouri, Chairman of the Summit and IAEM Host, shared: “I am very pleased to bring IAEM and our vast global resources to Dubai for this important inaugural event. The summit provides a platform for professionals to learn how to improve security resilience, determine best practices for planning and executing a comprehensive crisis management plan and ensure preparedness at all levels of an organisation or nation. IAEM’s mission is to serve its members by providing information, networking and professional opportunities, and to advance the emergency management profession. If you are involved in emergency management or related industries, this is a must-attend event.” Speakers at the Emergency Management & Business Contingency Summit include: • His Excellency Khaled Al Mansouri, President, International Council, IAEM • Ellis Stanley Sr., Chairman of IAEM Global Board • Colonel Khalid Nasser Al Razooqui, General Director Smart Services, Dubai Police, UAE • Dr. Saif Juma Aldhaheri, Director of Safety & Prevention, NCEMA, UAE • Ms. Naseem Mohammed Refee, Head of Consumer Products Safety Section, Dubai Municipality, UAE • Nasser Al Buhairy, Chief Security Officer & Head of Emergency Coordination Unit, Kuwait Oil Company • Humaid Al Kindi, Manager – Emergency Management, Environment Agency, Abu Dhabi • Hassan Mashhadi, Emergency Coordinator, NATO, Netherlands • And many more... The Emergency Management & Business Contingency Summit will take place on 7-8 October 2015 in Dubai, United Arab Emirates. Find the full programme, speaker list and registration form at www.emergencymanagementme.com/news , call + 971 4 364 2975 or email enquiry@iqpc.ae. - ENDS – Media contact: Vidhya Suman, +971 4 374 8265, Vidhya.suman@iqpc.ae or visit www.emergencymanagementme.com/news . Press are invited to attend this important industry forum. If you would like a complimentary press pass please email Vidhya Suman at Vidhya.suman@iqpc.ae. Lakshyadeep Nival
